byline.original: By AGNES T. CRANE and CHRISTOPHER SWANN

abstract: Reuters BreakingViews column; financial sector is expected to report weak third-quarter earnings, which will probably lead to major job cuts as the banks try to return to profitability; economic fear takes heavier toll on American oil company shares.
snippet: The financial sector is expected to report weak third-quarter earnings, which will probably lead to major job cuts as the banks try to return to profitability.
lead_paragraph: The financial sector is expected to report weak third-quarter earnings, which will probably lead to major job cuts as the banks try to return to profitability.

headline.main: Painful Job Cuts Coming to Wall St.
headline.seo: Painful Job Cuts Coming to Wall St.
headline.print_headline: Painful Job Cuts Coming to Wall St.
